message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.MA 

The paper proposes a novel two-level reinforcement learning framework to jointly optimize recommending and advertising strategies. This involves tackling high combinatorial action space problems and determining the optimal ad and location to insert. Therefore, the paper is likely to belong to the following arXiv CS sub-categories: 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning)
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval)
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence)
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms)
- cs.MA (Multiagent Systems)
